titles.title: A bill to ensure that the one half of the National Guard forces of each State are available to such State at all times, and for other purposes.
A bill to ensure that the one half of the National Guard forces of each State are available to such State at all times, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Requires Army and Air National Guard forces available to each state at all times to be at least 50 percent of the aggregate Army and Air National Guard forces of such state. Directs the Secretary of Defense, upon request of the appropriate governor, to transfer National Guard forces to a state in order to meet such requirement.
